December 4, 2013 - 6:30 pm

Atlanta - ALIF Institute

Wednesday December 4 @ 6:30 PM

The Stones Cry Out, a film by Yasmine Perni about the Story of the Palestinian Christians!

Join us for a fascinating documentary and an engaging panel led discussion.

Dinner @ 6:30pm, Film begins @ 7pm

Sandwich and soda available for $5 with RSVP.

This event is Open to All!

Please RSVP by Tuesday December 3.

facebook event
